name: Covid Kill - Mobile
description: COVID KILL is a unique shooting type game, intended to destroy all viruses. The game has 4 Mini-Bosses, each will come at the stages in multiple of 4. You may see different kinds of viruses throughout the game. Grey is normal, yellow is stronger, orange is faster, red is mini Boss, green is the kid of mini Boss, White is the final Boss, and brown is the kid of final Boss.
